Skill.15010000.2: Wields the lance to launch consecutive attacks.Strike 1: <color=#fb8037>&Param1& of ATK x2</color> as Lux DMG.Strike 2: <color=#fb8037>&Param2& of ATK</color> as Lux DMG.Strike 3: <color=#fb8037>&Param3& of ATK</color> as Lux DMG.Strike 4: <color=#fb8037>&Param4& of ATK x2</color> as Lux DMG.Strike 5: <color=#fb8037>&Param5& of ATK x2</color> and <color=#fb8037>&Param6& of ATK x6</color> as Lux DMG.
Skill.15031000.13: Sweeps the target and then fires a ray of laser, dealing DMG multiple times.The Main Skill can trigger ##Lux Mark: Radiance#2016#.
Skill.15031000.2: Sweeps the target, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param1& of ATK</color> as AoE Lux DMG, then fires a ray of laser, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param2& of ATK</color> as AoE Lux DMG.Thunderflare Strike (Main Skill) can trigger ##Lux Mark: Radiance#2016#, dealing &Param3& of ATK as Lux DMG.
Skill.15032000.13: Infuses Lux energy into the ground and generates Thunder Domains to deal DMG to random targets.The Support Skill can trigger ##Lux Mark: Radiance#2016#.
Skill.15032000.2: Infuses Lux energy into the ground, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param4& of ATK</color>/<color=#fb8037>&Param1& of ATK x12</color> as AoE Lux DMG. Then, generates a Thunder Domain in 4 random locations, each dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param2& of ATK</color> as AoE Lux DMG.Divine Thunderquake (Support Skill) can trigger ##Lux Mark: Radiance#2016#, dealing &Param3& of ATK as Lux DMG.
Skill.15040000.13: Throws a weapon, dealing massive DMG.The Ultimate can trigger ##Lux Mark: Radiance#2016#.
Skill.15040000.2: Throws the lance, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param1& of ATK</color> as AoE Lux DMG.Thunderfall Thrust (Ultimate) can trigger ##Lux Mark: Radiance#2016#, dealing &Param2& of ATK as Lux Mark DMG.
Skill.15510000.13: Commands Snow Rabbit and Night Rabbit to attack the target in turn to deal DMG.
Skill.15510000.2: Commands drones to attack the target in turn.Strike 1: Snow Rabbit fires bullets in a sweeping motion, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param1&</color> of ATK as Lux DMG.Strike 2: Night Rabbit fires missiles, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param2&</color> of ATK as Lux DMG.Strike 3: Snow Rabbit fires bullets in a sweeping motion, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param3&</color> of ATK as Lux DMG.Strike 4: Night Rabbit fires missiles, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param4&</color> of ATK as Lux DMG.
Skill.15531000.13: Summons several drones to attack the target repeatedly, dealing DMG.The Main Skill can trigger ##Lux Mark#1015#.
Skill.15531000.2: Calls for support. Commands 2 Snow Rabbits and 1 Night Rabbit to circle and attack the target for 10s.Snow Rabbits fire bullets in a sweeping motion, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param1& of ATK</color> as Lux DMG.Night Rabbit fires missiles, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param2& of ATK</color> as Lux DMG, and then explodes, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param3& of ATK</color> as AoE Lux DMG.Whirling Waves (Main Skill) can trigger ##Lux Mark#1015#, dealing &Param4& of ATK as Lux DMG.
Skill.15532000.13: Surfs with the drones, dealing DMG to targets along the way.The Support Skill can trigger ##Lux Mark#1015#.
Skill.15532000.2: Surfs 2 times, each dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param1& of ATK x2</color> as AoE Lux DMG.Ride 1: Snow Rabbit fires bullets in a sweeping motion, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param2& of ATK</color> as Lux DMG every 0.3s.Ride 2: Night Rabbit fires missiles, each dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param3& of ATK</color> as Lux DMG.Surfing Rondo (Support Skill) can trigger ##Lux Mark#1015#, dealing &Param4& of ATK as Lux DMG.
Skill.15540000.13: Fires the laser cannon repeatedly at the target, dealing DMG.The Ultimate can trigger ##Lux Mark#1015#.
Skill.15540000.2: Fires the laser cannon at the target, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param1& of ATK</color> as Lux DMG multiple times for 5s.The Ultimate Divine Deluge can trigger ##Lux Mark#1015#, dealing &Param2& of ATK as Lux DMG.
Skill.15610000.2: Shoots consecutively with the crossbow, each shot dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param1& of ATK</color> as Terra DMG. Stores up to 6 arrows.
Skill.15631000.13: Generates a penguin plushie that will explode.
Skill.15631000.2: Generates a penguin plushie that keeps moving toward the target and explodes in 3s, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param1& of ATK</color> as AoE Terra DMG and inflicting ##Terra Mark: Earth Vein#2029#. When the penguin plushie deals DMG, the target's &Param2& increases by <color=#fb8037>&Param3&</color> for &Param4&s.
Skill.15632000.13: Raffles several times and follows the main Trekker, attacking in different ways based on the raffle results and gaining bonuses.
Skill.15632000.2: Raffles 5 times and follows the main Trekker.Full penguins: Throws the plushie and generates a penguin statue, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param1& of ATK x7</color> as AoE Terra DMG. Full hearts: Shoots a heart arrow that restores the main Trekker's HP by <color=#fb8037>&Param2&</color> and explodes, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param3& of ATK</color> as AoE Terra DMG. Hearts and penguins: Shoots in a sweeping motion, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param4& of ATK x6</color> as Terra DMG. All these attacks inflict ##Terra Mark: Earth Vein#2029#.More penguins than hearts: The squad receive Kiss of Penguin, which increases &Param5& by <color=#fb8037>&Param6&</color> for &Param7&s. More hearts than penguins: The squad receive Kiss of Love, which increases &Param8& by <color=#fb8037>&Param9&</color> for &Param10&s.
Skill.15640000.13: Rides a shopping cart and spins rapidly, dealing multiple phases of DMG.
Skill.15640000.2: Rides a shopping cart and spins rapidly. Moves to any direction while the skill is active, dealing <color=#fb8037>&Param1& of ATK x11</color> as AoE Terra DMG and inflicting ##Terra Mark: Earth Vein#2029#. When the shopping cart explodes, increases the squad's &Param2& by <color=#fb8037>&Param3&</color> for &Param4&s.
Skill.8010301.2: Fires both pistols at the target rapidly.
Skill.8010302.2: Fires both pistols in a sweeping motion three times.
Skill.8011101.2: Shoots 3 Frost Arrows at the target.
Skill.8011102.2: Generates a Glacier Array, dealing DMG over time to targets within its range and slowing them down.
Skill.8011201.2: Swings the sword to perform multiple attacks.
Skill.8011202.2: Unleashes a flurry of sword strikes.
Skill.8012701.2: Swings the magic sword, dealing DMG multiple times.
Skill.8012702.2: Plants the magic sword in the ground to create a Tidal Domain that deals continuous DMG to enemies within the area. Increases the ATK of squadmates within the Tidal Domain. When they deal DMG, Teresa unleashes additional waves at their location, dealing AoE DMG. This effect can only be triggered once every 0.5s.
Skill.8013401.2: Punches rapidly, dealing multiple phases of DMG.
Skill.8013402.2: Strikes 3 all-out punches, dealing multiple instances of AoE DMG.
Skill.8015602.2: Throws a penguin doll at an enemy's feet and commands it to track and attack the enemy.
Skill.8211201.2: Unleashes a flurry of sword strikes.
